structure.unit: ARTICLE CV. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY STS OVERSIGHT TASK FORCE

text.section:
Sec. 2-1564. Organization.
The STS Task Force shall select a Vice-chairperson. A majority of the members shall constitute a quorum. The STS Task Force shall adopt a regular schedule of meetings. All meetings of the STS Task Force shall be public and written minutes shall be maintained.
